alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 04 at 2:52PM MST until March 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY FOR THE NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL PLAINS, NORTHEAST AND CENTRAL HIGHLANDS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITIES, AND ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT LATE MONDAY MORNING THROUGH THE AFTERNOON FOR THE CENTRAL HIGHLANDS, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLANDS AND NORTHEASTERN PLAINS OF NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... .Southwest to west winds strengthen Sunday with humidities lowering to less than 15 percent while temperatures will be about 5 to 15 degrees warmer than normal. Winds will not be quite as strong on Monday, but still sufficient gusty for a possible critical period over more centralized areas of the state as low humidity and above average temperatures persist. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Fire Weather Watch...which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * AREA AND TIMING...Red Flag Warning in effect for Northeast Plains (Zone 104), Northeast Highlands (Zone 123), and Central Highlands (Zone 125) from late Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon and Fire Weather Watch for late Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest to west 25 to 40 mph with gusts to around 55 mph on Sunday and southwest at 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph on Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from around 6 to 13 percent each afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains
